column3: â€œI recently picked up a healthy portion of Green Poison. I was initially drawn to its sweet citrusy and subtle earthy/piney aroma. Its buds are dense but light, with a generous dusting of sticky trichomes that leaves your finger tips smelling of freshly peeled oranges.
